short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search related bookmarks in search sites (google,..). Mark search terms, adds & search them on a toolbar, also on follow-up pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Bookmarks in search engines
Search, highlight and display relevant bookmarks when searching in your favorite search engine (Google, Ecosia, ..).
Highlight search terms add & search them on a toolbar, includiing follow-up pages.

## Features
### Main
*   **Show popup on search engine page with..**
    * bookmarks with same search terms in url or title
    * bookmarks with exact matching urls from search results

*   **Show toolbar with search terms**
    * cycle through them on the results page
    * as well as in any follow-up pages and tabs
	
*   **Highlight..**
    * search terms, in different colors      


### Other
* Customize when to activate: excluding or including URLs, subdomains, domains or tab
* Default search engines: google, stackoverflow, dogpile, baidu, yahoo, bing, ask, ecosia
* Shows viewpane as icon until searchbox contains > 2 characters
* When all search terms not found, search for one less search term combination (marked with different icon)
* Clicking on "Found" shortly highlights same urls
* When bookmark url matches are below scrolling, show a jump button at bottom
* Minimize: Show only small window with icons
* Support quoted searches
* Dark Theme automatically selected to your browser theme
* exact matching urls found *in search results*

## Future features (depending on API possibilities*)
* Show bookmark favicon *
* Search bookmark tags 
* Search bookmark description *
* Open Bookmarks Sidebar when clicking bookmarks *
* Open edit dialog to edit bookmark *
* Search not exact, similar urls (possibly domains only)
